member.name: MIB_IPFORWARDTABLE
member.summary: TheMIB_IPFORWARDTABLE structure contains a table of IPv4 route entries.

member.name: MIB_IPFORWARDTABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of route entries in the table.

member.name: MIB_IPFORWARDTABLE.table
member.summary: A pointer to a table of route entries implemented as an array of structures.
